name: wapmorgan/unified-archive
description: UnifiedArchive - unified interface to archive (zip, 7z, rar, gz, bz2, xz, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, tar.x, tar.Z, iso-9660) for listing, reading, extracting and creation + built-in console packer and unpacker + fully implemented PclZip-like interface (create, listContent, extract, properties, add, delete, merge, duplicate).

suggest.ext-zlib: Allows unpack GZ files and TAR archives with gzip compression.
suggest.ext-bz2: Allows unpack BZ2 files and TAR archives with bzip2 compression.
suggest.ext-xz: Allows unpack XZ files and TAR archives with lzma2 compression.
suggest.ncompress: Allows unpack TAR archives with LZW compression.
